note.p: American. Daughter of Dr Uri Judd and his wife Isabella. Married Ebenezer Backus Jones, merchant, of Penn Yan, New York, in 1831.
10,000 vital records of central New York, 1813–1850 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 October 2020)

Cuyler Reynolds, ed., Hudson-Mohawk genealogical and family memoirs (New York: Lewis Historical Publishing Company, 1911): Platt (schenectadyhistory.org/families/hmgfm/platt.html, accessed 27 October 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 October 2020)
